channel.title: [562] item dropping/items on death [562]
channel.description:
Okay in my 562 when you drop an item, it dissapears, i know it's for economy, but how can i fix this? please help!
Okay when someone dies in my 562 server, them keep all of there items no matter what, how can i make it so they drop them all, and that it shows on the floor? please help this is more important than item dropping, most important thing i need to fix atm, i want it so they only keep 3 items.
